cause.description:
Sanctuary for Families envisions a society in which freedom from domestic violence is a basic human right. We are dedicated to the safety, healing, and self-sufficiency of battered women and their children. In the past year alone we have provided direct services to over 8,000 women and children.
Sanctuary has 125 full-time and 18 part-time staff working out of eight office and shelter locations in Manhattan, Brooklyn, and the Bronx. Through active recruitment of bilingual and bicultural staff, Sanctuary is able to offer services to clients in 28 languages; many more languages are represented by our hundreds of pro bono attorneys and volunteers.
We invite you to read more about the services we offer at the Sanctuary for Families site http://www.sanctuaryforfamilies.org/
1. Sanctuary for Families is the largest nonprofit in New York State dedicated exclusively to serving domestic violence victims and their children.
2. Each year, Sanctuary helps thousands of victims and their children build safe lives by offering high quality services to meet their complex needs.
3. These services include clinical, legal, shelter, a children’s program and economic stability services.
4. Sanctuary also works to end domestic violence and its far-reaching impact through outreach, education, and advocacy.
